#summary The ilayer element represents an inline transparent or opaque layer.
#labels about-html,is-html-element,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > *ilayer element*

== Usage ==

Do not use `<ilayer>`.  It was introduced in [BrowserNetscape4 Netscape 4] and has never been supported by any other browser.
